class CookieService{setCookie(name,value,days){const expires=new Date();expires.setTime(expires.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);document.cookie="".concat(name,"=").concat(value,";expires=").concat(expires.toUTCString(),";path=/;SameSite=Strict");}getCookie(name){const cookies=document.cookie.split('; ');for(const cookie of cookies){const[cookieName,cookieValue]=cookie.split('=');if(cookieName===name){return cookieValue;}}return null;}removeCookie(name){document.cookie="".concat(name,"=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT;path=/");}isAuthenticated(){return cookieServiceInstance.getCookie('account')?true:false;}}CookieService.token="token";CookieService.account="connectedAccount";const cookieServiceInstance=new CookieService();// Creating an instance of CookieService
export default cookieServiceInstance;// Exporting the named instance as the default export
